short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Go! Weather is an easy-to-use weather app that displays the accurate 5 day weather forecast as well as the current time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get your free daily weather forecast for your city.

This extension Middlebox search with Bing. 

Go! Weather is an easy-to-use weather app that displays the accurate 5 day weather forecast as well as the current time.
